articles.description: The Manchester United forward started the game on the bench - before coming on as a second-half substitute - as England recorded a 3-0 win to book a quarter-final match against France.

articles.title: Ehmer defends Gills manager Harris - Kent Online
articles.description: Centre-back Max Ehmer concedes Gillingham’s players are letting down boss Neil Harris.

articles.title: David Beckham is branded a 'hypocrite' by Earthshot Prize viewers - Daily Mail
articles.description: David Beckham, 47, was criticised when he appeared in the US city of Boston to present an accolade during The Earthshot Prize ceremony on Sunday night having jetted in from Qatar.
